summary: DELAY IN ACCELERATION WHEN ACCELERATOR IS DEPRESSED.  *MR  THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED A SHORT DELAY WHEN THE ACCELERATOR WAS PRESSED.  THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ILLUMINATED.  THE VEHICLE JERKED FORWARD UPON ACCELERATION AND THE VEHICLE BECAME NOTICEABLY LOUDER WHEN SHIFTING BETWEEN GEARS.  THE TECHNICIAN INDICATED THAT THE TRANSMISSIONS COMPONENT APPEARED TO BE USED OR REMANUFACTURED.  *PH   *NLM
